name: ice-truck-tracking
description: Complete Ice Truck Tracking System with real-time monitoring, geofencing, and multi-channel notifications

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../sdk/edge && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../../services/notification && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:sdks && npm run build:notification
scripts.build:sdks: cd sdk/edge && npm run build && cd ../mobile && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:sdks && npm run test:notification
scripts.test:sdks: cd sdk/edge && npm test && cd ../mobile && npm test
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:sdks && npm run lint:notification
scripts.lint:sdks: cd sdk/edge && npm run lint && cd ../mobile && npm run lint

author: Ice Truck Tracking Team
